1.0.name: wordpress/wpbase-video
1.0.description:
Features :

  1. Add videos from any site by just using the embed code.

  2. Easy & simple Video submission.

  3. Dedicated backend Video manager.

  4. Easy editing and deletion from the Video manager.

  5. Custom post-metas.

  6. Add thumbnails from URL or upload directly.

  7. Simple and easy to use backend.

  8. Integrated "Views" & "Time" variables.
